channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17323] SemiJoin: Detect DPP edge as running parallel to semi-join
item.description:
HIVE-16260 allows removal of parallel edges of semijoin with mapjoins.

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-16260

However, it should also consider dynamic partition pruning edge like semijoin without removing it while traversing the query tree.
item.summary: SemiJoin: Detect DPP edge as running parallel to semi-join

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Initial patch. Added a test which ensures the semijoin edge feeding into a map AFTER the DPP is not there.

gopalv jdere Can you please review?

I think this patch has a test conflict with HIVE-17399, think my comments for that JIRA cover the the q.out for this one too.
